trans-unit.target: TEXT_HEAVNY806_02106_SEQ_00<tab>Eloin thinks you are just the <var 08 E905 ((woman)) ((man)) /var> he is looking for.

TEXT_HEAVNY806_02106_SEQ_01<tab>In accordance with the Lord Commander's orders, the Temple Knights have established a system for accepting and issuing leves similar to the one administered by the Adventurers' Guilds of Eorzea. Should you wish to undertake any of these leves, you need only speak with Eloin in Foundation.
TEXT_HEAVNY806_02106_TODO_ELOIN_000_000<tab>Beg your pardon, but you are <var 08 E905 ((Mistress)) ((Master)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var>, I presume?
TEXT_HEAVNY806_02106_TODO_ELOIN_000_001<tab>Just the <var 08 E905 ((woman)) ((man)) /var> I was hoping to see! It so happens I have a proposition for you.

TEXT_HEAVNY806_02106_TODO_ELOIN_000_002<tab>You see, in accordance with the lord commander's orders, we have established a new system similar to the one administered by the Adventurers' Guilds of Eorzea.
TEXT_HEAVNY806_02106_TODO_ELOIN_000_003<tab>We are to document the petitions of the people and distribute them to motivated individuals like yourself.
TEXT_HEAVNY806_02106_TODO_ELOIN_000_004<tab>Were you to assist us with these leves, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>, we would be most grateful─and we would compensate you accordingly!
TEXT_HEAVNY806_02106_TODO_SYSTEM_000_005<tab>You may now undertake Temple leves by speaking with Eloin.

TEXT_HEAVNY806_02106_TODO_SYSTEM_100_005<tab>In addition to normal levequests which require one leve allowance to accept, there are also <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>large-scale levequests<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> which require ten.
TEXT_HEAVNY806_02106_TODO_SYSTEM_100_006<tab>These quests will require more effort, but yield richer rewards.
